about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

An erotic Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor.
The story continues with Nikki and her husband meeting the Boss and his newest girlfriend for an unforgettable wild night.
Will Yvette be everything they ever wanted?
Will Adam feel comfortable being dominated by the Bull in front of a stranger?
Follow their Sex Story and find out!

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Nikki & Adam, and embark on their journey of spicing up their marital life in a brand new and wild cuckold Sex Story.

EPISODE 9
A threesome is something Nikki always wanted to try but never had a real opportunity to do with Adam. So when the Boss asked her if she would be interested in adding a woman to their dirty little group, she said Hell yes!
He knew just the right girl, and she knew just the perfect venue, so they set up a date to give this fantasy a try.

Nikki is anxious to meet the vixen, but Adam has his doubts.
The Boss has been cryptic about the girl, and Adam isn't sure whether or not he told her about his cuckold fantasy. Not to mention, he has not experienced having a stranger's eyes on him while being on his knees.

Will Yvette be everything they ever wanted?
Will Adam feel comfortable being dominated by the Bull in front of her?
Follow their Sex Story and find out!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains lesbian and straight sex scenes.
